page.title: 11FRANT C.E.(CONTROLLED)SCHOOL
page.content: At the time of writing our school has 67 children on roll. These children are in three classes. They start school at 4.\ to 5 years old and leave when they are 11 years old. The school has 3 full time and one part time teacher. In addition to the teaching staff there is a secretary/ancillary assistant, a canteen assistant and a caretaker. Frant school was built in 1852 and replaced an earlier building. The parish church played an important roll in the establishment of the school and even today the rector of Frant and two members of the church are on the Board of School Governors. Our County, East Sussex, has a great number of small rural schools. It is to be hoped that in the current climate these establishments do not fall victim to educational cuts.
